content:

thought: To craft a wooden sword, I need to first craft warped planks. To craft warped planks, I need to place 2 stripped warped stems in the crafting grid. I have 1 stripped warped stem at slot 37, therefore I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
